text: Ni apeleche soni Allah chilandanyo (chine) chaŵandu ŵaŵili. Jumo mwa ŵaŵilio bubu, jwangalikombolela pachilichose, soni jwalakwe jugambile kuŵa nsigo ŵakwasitopesya abwana ŵakwe, kulikose kuchannungamisye jwangaujako ni yambone (achi ni chilandanyo cha kafili). Ana mpaka alandane jwalakweju ni ajula jwaakulamula mwa chilungamiko, soni jwalakwe ali petala lyagoloka (jwali Nsilamu)
